Text: does this version have the subtitles issue the other versions have? The extended version did not have an American/western release, so the subtitles are from the "not-extended" version, creating an issue with subtitles. Is that remedied in this release?
I believe it's all sorted.

no offense to the uploader, but i'd like a report from someone who actually tests the download.  i just checked out his Oldboy upload and the audio tracks and subs are not what is described and from what i can tell there is no proper DTS Korean track without some sort of superimposed commentary / translation.
I will have a look at Oldboy sometime this weekend and replace it if it's dodgy. I'm afraid I don't have time to watch everything before uploading.

i understand completely, and don't mean to sound ungrateful.  you do a great service providing all these uploads - i just want to point out things i feel might mislead others or cause frustration, since we all know time is in short supply for many of us...

I've checked OLDBOY, and there is NOTHING WONG with it. Audio #3 is the original Korean ONLY - as stated in the description - and there is also nothing wrong with the subs.

Please refrain from making false claims.
